alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 10 at 4:53AM EST until February 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Forest, Jefferson PA, Higher Elevations of Fayette, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland, and Indiana Counties. In West Virginia, Eastern Preston, Eastern Tucker, and Preston Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.
